content.raw: please test the previous <effort> value for the Aldebaran model and control the robot with your tuned PID limits, maybe the simulator will not crash with using step_time 0.01, and also please test the controller using simple behavior, like only keep the robot stand up and command your agent to move its arm slowly to be aligned with it body.
content.html: please test the previous <effort> value for the Aldebaran model and control the robot with your tuned PID limits, maybe the simulator will not crash with using step_time 0.01, and also please test the controller using simple behavior, like only keep the robot stand up and command your agent to move its arm slowly to be aligned with it body.
